age.Units: Years, with one decimal precision (i.e., 20.5 means, at the day of testing, the participant was 20 years and 6 months old)

handedness.Description: Whether someone is left-handed, right-handed, or ambidextrous

edu.Description: Highest level of education that participant is/was enrolled in

Levels.university: University level (Dutch 'WO'), either bachelor or master level

raven_score.Description: Score on Raven's Progressive Matrices test (duration: 30 min)

NEO_A.Description: Score on the Agreeableness scale of the NEO-FFI
Score on the Agreeableness scale of the NEO-FFI

NEO_C.Description: Score on the Conscientiousness scale of the NEO-FFI

NEO_E.Description: Score on the Extraversion scale of the NEO-FFI

NEO_N.Description: Score on the Neuroticism scale of the NEO-FFI

NEO_O.Description: Score on the Openness scale of the NEO-FFI
